admissionProcess: The admission process at ABC University involves an online application and an entrance examination. Prospective students are required to submit their applications online through our official website.

events.name: Annual College Fest
events.description: Join us for a day filled with music, dance, art exhibitions, and cultural performances. Experience the vibrant diversity of our students' talents and cultural backgrounds.

events.name: Tech Expo
events.description: Witness the brilliance of our students and faculty as they showcase cutting-edge technological innovations and projects. Engage in interactive exhibits and learn about the latest advancements in technology.

researchHistory: Established in 1950, ABC University boasts a rich history of pioneering research in Physics and Mathematics. Our institution has been a driving force in shaping scientific discoveries and technological advancements over the decades.

sports.achievements: Our football team has displayed exceptional prowess on the field, securing the Intercollegiate Football Championship five times. Their dedication to teamwork and perseverance is commendable.
Ranked among the top three teams in the National College Basketball League, our basketball team showcases exceptional skill, sportsmanship, and determination.
Our swimming team has made a splash in the state-level competitions, holding records in multiple events. Their commitment to excellence and hard work is evident in their achievements.
The champions of the University Tennis Tournament for three consecutive years, our tennis team exemplifies finesse, technique, and a winning spirit.
Our cricket team's achievements on the pitch are remarkable, and their sportsmanship sets a shining example for the cricketing community.
